desc: An educational institution for higher learning after high school.
example: She is studying biology at the university.

desc: A set of lessons on a particular subject.
example: He enrolled in a programming course.

desc: A person who teaches something, especially in a college or training center.
example: The instructor explained the topic clearly.

desc: A person who is studying at a school or college.
example: The student asked a question during class.

desc: A formal talk given to teach a subject, often at university.
example: We attended a lecture on world history.

desc: A person who gives or grades an examination.
example: The examiner asked very difficult questions.

desc: A mark given for academic work.
example: He got a good grade on his essay.

desc: A piece of work to be done, often as part of a job or course.
example: Your task is to complete the worksheet.
She gave the correct answer to the question.

desc: A sentence or phrase used to find out information.
example: He asked a difficult question during the lesson.
